verses.roman:
śuna, bhaṭṭācārya,--"āmi gelāṅa bahu-deśa
vana-pathe duḥkhera kāhāṅ nāhi pāi leśa

synonyms: śuna—please hear; bhaṭṭācārya—My dear Bhaṭṭācārya; āmi—I; gelāṅa—traveled; bahu-deśa—many countries; vana-pathe—through the forest path; duḥkhera—of unhappiness; kāhāṅ—anywhere; nāhi pāi—I do not get; leśa—even a trace.
translation: "My dear Bhaṭṭācārya, I have traveled very far through the forest, and I have not even slightly received any trouble.
